data.message: Thrilled with these real stories, I realized how important it is to have friends! <3

replies.message: We couldn't agree more Clara Félix - friends and family are so important for those going through treatment. -Lauren
A good connection to share information and past/present experiences.  Family members play an important role.

I know!  It's not always the friends that you thought you had for many years, but it's the people who you have crossed paths with who are true troopers and understand what you are going through.  They are there for you unconditionally.  It is proven to me daily.  Thank God for those Angles of Mercy.

Barbara Perry I am very happy to know of restoring health to these people, and even happier to know that this world still worth it! And you know why? Because there is good-hearted people, people who care about your neighbor! people who have love for others without even knowing it!! Same Moved!
